name: cofhe-base-miniapp
description: A monorepo containing templates and smart contracts for building privacy-preserving dApps using CoFHE

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd packages/cofhe-nextjs && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../foundry && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd packages/cofhe-nextjs && npm install && cd ../foundry && npm install
